title: List of sites in address window drop-down
content: How do I change the site addresses that come up when I click the address bar? Time was I got a list of sites that I use often, perhaps several time in a day. I still use those sites but some have been replaced by addresses that I've used once or twice and probably won't use again for months. Where's the sense behind identifying as a "favourite" something I use twice in a week but not again and throwing out something I use week in and week out. How do I get rid of these interlopers?

title: Performance and Connectivity
content:
I am experiencing significant performance problems in Mozilla Firefox when using certain AI-powered tools. Below are the specific issues: 

   Flux AI & Diagramming AI Performance Warnings 
       Issue: When accessing Flux AI or Diagramming AI tools, Firefox displays a warning message stating, "This site is slowing down Firefox." 
       Observed Behavior: 
           Delayed response times or freezing when interacting with these tools. 
           High CPU usage (observed via Task Manager) when the tools are active. 
       Expected Behavior: Smooth operation without performance degradation, as seen in other browsers (e.g., Chrome or Edge). 
   CMS Sign-Out Failure 
       Issue: Unable to sign out of my Content Management System (CMS). The action either freezes or refreshes without logging me out. 
       Troubleshooting Attempted: Cleared cache/cookies, disabled extensions, tested in Safe Mode—issue persists. 
   ChatGPT Menu Error 
       Issue: Clicking the three-dots (⋮) menu in ChatGPT triggers an error instead of displaying options. 
       Error Context: Mentions "Flux AI," suggesting a possible conflict or integration failure.
creator: basitaliaps

title: Ich kann eine Website nicht aufrufen
content: Guten Tag, ich kann eine Website auf dem Laptop nicht aufrufen, die über das Smartphone erreichbar, also sicher ist. Es handelt sich um meinen Berufsverband. Ob die Wahl oben richtig ist, weiß ich nicht, so gut kann ich kein Englisch und möchte nicht erst alle Begriffe übersetzen. Wäre schön, wenn es die Hilfeseite auch in Deutsch gäbe. MfG Dr. Boettiger

title: Восстановление данных с прошлого профиля.
content:
Здравствуйте, уважаемые firefox.

Недавно переустанавливая в очередной раз Windows столкнулся с проблемой синхронизации моих данных в вашем браузере. Пароли, закладки, журнал и тд не синхронизировалось, а при открытии того самого старого профиля через about:profiles, тоже ничего.

Я был очень опечален данным результатом, так как там хранилось много нужной мне информации. К тому же, удалением профилей или чем-то таким я не занимался. Прошу помочь мне и отправить ответ на почту.

С уважением, doraikesshu@mail.ru
creator: doraikesshu
